name: GRACE BUILDING CO., INC., Petitioner v. RICHLAND TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Grace Building Co. v. Richland Township Board of Supervisors

parties: GRACE BUILDING CO., INC., Petitioner v. RICHLAND TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2011, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
Petition for leave to file response to answer of Richland Township is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
21 A.3d 678
GRACE BUILDING CO., INC., Petitioner v. RICHLAND TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 13, 2011.
